# Sudo Make Coffee

Sudo Make Coffee is an **highly configurable** and **extensible** IRC bot written in Ruby that supports multiple IRC channels.

It uses a **publish/subscribe policy** to enable a many-to-many communication between the bot and the irc channels.

## Authors and Contributors
* [Alessandro Molari](http://molarialessandro.info)
